posts.title: Shelcol-50
posts.description: Shelcal-500 Tablet is a Calcium and Vitamin D supplement which is used for improving bone and joint health. It is used for treating Calcium and Vitamin D deficiency and associated conditions like osteoporosis, osteomalacia, etc.

posts.title: Zincovit Tablet 15's
posts.description: Zincovit Tablet is a nutritional supplement with vitamins A, B complex, C, D, and E and minerals such as Magnesium, Manganese, Iodine, Copper, Selenium, Chromium, Zinc, and Grape seed extracts.
